p.k: On the one-year anniversary of a historic playoff collapse against Cleveland, Indiana flipped the script by rallying from a 17-point halftime deficit

n.u: Nuggets/Mavericks, 2009 NBA Western Conference Semifinals - Game

p.n: Nuggets/Mavericks, 2009 NBA Western Conference Semifinals - Game 3
p.k: Behind 30 points from Carmelo Anthony and 28 from Chauncey Billups, the Denver Nuggets beat the Dallas Mavericks 124-110 to wrap up their semifinal series
